review: I visited Avion at Carrollwood and was disappointed from the start. The management was unresponsive to my inquiries, and the overall maintenance of the property was poor. There were visible signs of mold and pest infestations, which are major red flags for me. The few positive aspects, like the friendly staff, were not enough to outweigh the significant issues. I do not recommend this place and would avoid it if I were you.
